name: Internet for All
title: Universal Internet Access
description: In 2023, Saudi Arabia achieved a remarkable feat with 100% of both male and female populations using the internet, showcasing the country's commitment to digital inclusivity.

name: Training? What's That?
title: Lack of Formal Training in Firms
description: Only 3.9% of firms in Saudi Arabia offered formal training to their employees in 2022, indicating a potential area for improvement in workforce development.

name: Energy Source Mystery
title: Minimal Use of Combustible Renewables
description: In 2022, Saudi Arabia's reliance on combustible renewables and waste for energy was a mere 0.003%, highlighting the country's focus on other energy sources.

name: Security Concerns
title: High Losses from Theft and Vandalism
description: In 2022, Saudi Arabian firms reported losses due to theft and vandalism amounting to 61.9% of annual sales, pointing to significant security challenges.
